dependencies.description:
This library simplifies using Google's various server-to-server
authentication mechanisms to access Google APIs.
dependencies.name: py-google-auth

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
MIVisionX toolkit is a set of comprehensive computer vision and machine
intelligence libraries, utilities, and applications bundled into a
single toolkit.
dependent_to.name: mivisionx

dependent_to.description:
A double-entry bookkeeping computer language that lets you define
financial transaction records in a text file, read them in memory,
generate a variety of reports from them, and provides a web interface..
dependent_to.name: py-beancount

dependent_to.description:
This package allows developers to interact with Google Earth Engine
using the Python programming language.
dependent_to.name: py-earthengine-api

dependent_to.description:
Workflow management system to create reproducible and scalable data
analyses.
dependent_to.name: snakemake

description:
The Google API Client for Python is a client library for accessing the
Plus, Moderator, and many other Google APIs.
name: py-google-api-python-client

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
